location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5803/47 'Grant of visa to Mr Subbaiah'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.
The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence regarding a request by a Mr V Subbiah (various spellings throughout) for a British visa to go to France from Pondicherry. Related matters of discussion include the following: request and complaints from V Subbiah regarding his British visa application; an enquiry about Subbiah's nationality; the integrity and validity of Subbiah's French passport; Subbiah's political opinions on the British Government of India; Subbiah's election as a representative of the French Establishment in India.The file features the following principal correspondents: the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; the Commonwealth Relations Office, the Foreign Office; the British Consulate General, Pondicherry.The file includes a divider which gives the subject number, the year the subject file was opened, the subject heading, and a list of correspondence references by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
